name: The Last Drop Of Velvet
description:
Made in less than a day, with only 100 lines of code.

Cw: Written depictions of gore

Under the waning light of the moon, bathe in its light on the most loneliest tree of the meadow and watch as the sky bubbles and blisters. Welcoming the guests and visitors of hallow and autumn.

The Last Drop Of Velvet is a short piece of interactive fiction with a play time of 5 - 10 Minutes.
